bibl.title: Some Egyptian Bishops and the Date of PLandlisten.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: Van Gucht, Wilfried

bibl.note: We may safely assume that P. Landlisten were conceived after 346/347 A.D.
Van Gucht Wilfried, Some Egyptian Bishops and the Date of PLandlisten.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 1135-1140.
